name: Evil Shiba Inu
description: EVIL SHIBA inu ($ESI) is a BEP20 community owned token with [ Renounced Ownership] based on Binance Smart Chain and has a total supply of 420,000,000 Tokens raised from the darkness, with utilities made to add more value to $ESI and provide the benefit to its holders. Our mission is to provide actual value and real-world use cases to make $ESI a leader in the DeFi space, by developing a complete ecosystem. The ecosystem will consist of our crypto-powered Play-to-earn game, NFT's, NFT marketplace, and other financial offerings, with more to follow, as the Metaverse takes shape.
